title: Maze Runner
except: A game built using PyGame a Python game library.
post:

title: Brookes Entrepreneurs
imgAlt: A white BE on blue background. Brookes Entrepreneurs logo
except: Information regarding the site I built for the Brookes entrepreneurs!
post:
Brookes Entrepreneurs are a large society at Brookes. THey host many talks and events in which you can meet some really interesting people. When to designing there site I needed to take all of that into account before I could finish it.
